# The `RedirectingFSDirRemapIterImpl` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Directory iterator implementation for <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/redirectingfilesystem">RedirectingFileSystem</a>&#39;s</code> directory remap entries that maps the paths reported by the external file system&#39;s directory iterator back to the virtual directory&#39;s path. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Directory iterator implementation for <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/redirectingfilesystem">RedirectingFileSystem</a>&#39;s</code> directory remap entries that maps the paths reported by the external file system&#39;s directory iterator back to the virtual directory&#39;s path.
